attributes.action: Make immigrant workers pay or get health insurance(Like in the US) for treatment on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simple really.Immigrant workers,in work pr not,get exactly the same treatments available to them on the NHS as soon as they arrive here.Ive been working to pay for mine over the last 25 years,via NI payments and taxes.What have they paid into our system when they arrive...nothing
